mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID LIKE '%'||#{val}||'%' WHERE PRODUCT_MAKER LIKE LOWER('%'||#{val}||'%') OR PRODUCT_MAKER LIKE UPPER('%'||#{val}||'%') WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{val}||'%' ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_MAKER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE) VALUES(#{productId}, #{productMaker}, #{productName}, #{productPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT P.*, I.PRODUCTIMG_PATH, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME1, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME2, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME3 FROM PRODUCTIMG I RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.*, I.PRODUCTIMG_PATH, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME1, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME2, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME3 FROM PRODUCTIMG I RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 9

SELECT P.*, I.PRODUCTIMG_PATH, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME1, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME2, I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME3 FROM PRODUCTIMG I RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID WHERE LOWER(P.PRODUCT_NAME) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{val})||'%' OR LOWER(P.PRODUCT_MAKER) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{val})||'%' ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_ID DESC
SELECT P.*,I.PRODUCTIMG_PATH,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME1,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME2,I.PRODUCTIMG_NAME3 FROM PRODUCTIMG I RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.PRODUCT_ID WHERE I.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
